modules.name: Content Analysis
modules.description: Analyzes content quality, relevance, and AI-friendliness

insights.title: Strong topical authority in core areas
insights.description: Your content demonstrates deep expertise in cloud infrastructure and DevOps topics, which aligns well with AI-first search preferences.

insights.title: Content freshness needs improvement
insights.description: 25% of your top-performing pages haven't been updated in over 12 months, which may affect AI model training data relevance.

issues.title: Thin content on key landing pages
issues.description: 15 product pages have less than 300 words, which is insufficient for AI models to extract meaningful context.

issues.title: Missing structured data on blog posts
issues.description: Blog articles lack Article schema markup, reducing AI model comprehension of authorship and publishing details.

recommendations.title: Expand product page content depth
recommendations.description: Add comprehensive use cases, technical specifications, and comparison tables to product pages. Target 800-1200 words per page.

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive schema markup
recommendations.description: Add Article, Product, and Organization schema across relevant pages to enhance AI model understanding.

recommendations.title: Create quarterly content refresh schedule
recommendations.description: Establish a systematic review process to update high-traffic pages with latest data, examples, and insights.

modules.name: E-E-A-T Assessment
modules.description: Evaluates Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

insights.title: Strong author credibility signals
insights.description: Technical authors have well-documented industry experience and credentials, which AI models prioritize.

insights.title: Limited external validation
insights.description: Few citations from authoritative third-party sources, which could strengthen trust signals.

issues.title: Inconsistent author bylines
issues.description: 40% of blog posts lack author attribution or link to author bio pages.

recommendations.title: Standardize author attribution
recommendations.description: Ensure all content includes author bylines with links to detailed bio pages showcasing credentials and experience.

recommendations.title: Build third-party citation network
recommendations.description: Pursue mentions and citations in industry publications, research papers, and authoritative tech blogs.

modules.name: Keyword Optimization
modules.description: Analyzes keyword targeting for AI-first search contexts

insights.title: Good coverage of branded keywords
insights.description: Strong presence for brand-specific queries, but limited visibility for non-branded, intent-driven searches.

issues.title: Low coverage of conversational queries
issues.description: Content doesn't target natural language question patterns that AI models prefer (e.g., 'how to', 'what is', 'best way to').

issues.title: Missing semantic keyword clusters
issues.description: Pages focus on single keywords rather than comprehensive topic clusters that AI models use for context.

recommendations.title: Develop FAQ-based content
recommendations.description: Create comprehensive FAQ sections addressing common conversational queries in your domain.

recommendations.title: Build semantic topic clusters
recommendations.description: Reorganize content around core topics with pillar pages and supporting cluster content.

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Evaluates technical infrastructure and crawlability

insights.title: Excellent site performance
insights.description: Core Web Vitals are consistently in the 'good' range, which positively impacts AI crawler efficiency.

issues.title: Inconsistent URL structure
issues.description: Mixed URL patterns make it harder for AI models to understand site hierarchy and content relationships.

issues.title: Robots.txt blocking valuable content
issues.description: Case studies and whitepapers are blocked from AI crawlers, missing key authority-building content.

recommendations.title: Audit and fix robots.txt
recommendations.description: Review crawler directives to ensure all valuable content is accessible to AI search engines.

recommendations.title: Standardize URL architecture
recommendations.description: Implement consistent URL patterns that clearly indicate content type and hierarchy.

modules.name: Competitor Analysis
modules.description: Benchmarks performance against key competitors in AI-first search

insights.title: Leading in technical content depth
insights.description: Your technical documentation outperforms competitors in comprehensiveness, a key advantage for AI models.

insights.title: Lagging in content volume
insights.description: Competitors publish 3x more content monthly, giving them broader topical coverage in AI training data.

issues.title: Competitors dominate comparison queries
issues.description: AI models primarily reference competitor content for '[your product] vs [competitor]' queries.

recommendations.title: Create comprehensive comparison hub
recommendations.description: Build authoritative comparison content that presents balanced, detailed analysis of your solution vs. competitors.

recommendations.title: Accelerate content publication cadence
recommendations.description: Increase content production to 12-15 pieces per month to match competitor volume.

modules.name: AI Visibility
modules.description: Measures presence in AI-powered search results (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini)

insights.title: Strong ChatGPT citation rate
insights.description: Your content is cited in 45% of relevant ChatGPT responses, above industry average of 28%.

insights.title: Lower visibility in Perplexity
insights.description: Only 22% citation rate in Perplexity, suggesting opportunities for recency and source authority improvements.

issues.title: Limited presence in comparative responses
issues.description: When AI models compare solutions, competitors are mentioned 2.5x more frequently.

recommendations.title: Optimize for Perplexity's recency bias
recommendations.description: Publish timely, newsworthy content and maintain aggressive content freshness to match Perplexity's preferences.

recommendations.title: Enhance competitive positioning content
recommendations.description: Create detailed feature comparison matrices, use case analyses, and implementation guides that AI models can reference.

modules.name: Brand Sentiment
modules.description: Analyzes how AI models characterize and position your brand

insights.title: Consistently positive characterization
insights.description: AI models use positive descriptors (innovative, reliable, developer-friendly) in 82% of brand mentions.

insights.title: Strong association with key value props
insights.description: AI models correctly associate your brand with ease of use, performance, and security in unprompted responses.

issues.title: Occasional outdated information
issues.description: Some AI responses reference deprecated features or pricing, indicating training data lag.

recommendations.title: Maintain public changelog and release notes
recommendations.description: Publish detailed, AI-crawlable changelog to help models stay current with product evolution.

recommendations.title: Amplify third-party validation
recommendations.description: Pursue case studies, testimonials, and awards that reinforce positive brand associations in AI training data.

modules.name: Content Analysis
modules.description: Analyzes content quality, relevance, and AI-friendliness

insights.title: Emerging healthcare content authority
insights.description: Your medical content shows promise, but needs more depth and clinical validation to compete in AI-first search.

insights.title: Limited content freshness
insights.description: Healthcare information becomes outdated quickly. 40% of your content is over 18 months old.

issues.title: Medical disclaimers affecting AI comprehension
issues.description: Excessive legal disclaimers reduce content clarity for AI models trying to extract medical information.

issues.title: Missing author credentials for medical content
issues.description: Medical articles lack author credentials, which are critical for E-E-A-T in healthcare.

recommendations.title: Add medical professional bylines
recommendations.description: Ensure all health content is authored or reviewed by licensed medical professionals with credentials displayed.

recommendations.title: Implement quarterly medical content review
recommendations.description: Establish process to review and update medical content every 3 months to maintain accuracy.

modules.name: E-E-A-T Assessment
modules.description: Evaluates Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

insights.title: Medical licensing adds credibility
insights.description: Your organization's healthcare licenses are recognized by AI models as strong trust signals.

issues.title: Inconsistent author attribution
issues.description: Only 55% of articles have clear author attribution with professional credentials.

recommendations.title: Create comprehensive author bio pages
recommendations.description: Build detailed bio pages for all medical contributors showcasing education, licenses, and experience.

modules.name: Keyword Optimization
modules.description: Analyzes keyword targeting for AI-first search contexts

insights.title: Missing symptom-based queries
insights.description: Healthcare searchers often use symptom descriptions. Your content doesn't target these conversational queries.

issues.title: Technical medical jargon limits accessibility
issues.description: Content uses technical terms without plain-language explanations, reducing AI model comprehension.

recommendations.title: Create symptom-based content clusters
recommendations.description: Develop content targeting how users describe symptoms in natural language.

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Evaluates technical infrastructure and crawlability

insights.title: Good HTTPS and security implementation
insights.description: Strong security signals are critical for healthcare sites and positively impact trust.

issues.title: Slow page load times on mobile
issues.description: Healthcare pages load slowly on mobile devices, impacting both user experience and crawl efficiency.

recommendations.title: Optimize mobile page performance
recommendations.description: Implement lazy loading for images, minify CSS/JS, and optimize for Core Web Vitals.

modules.name: Competitor Analysis
modules.description: Benchmarks performance against key competitors in AI-first search

insights.title: Lagging behind major health portals
insights.description: Established health information sites have 3-4x more AI citations for similar health queries.

issues.title: Limited coverage of common conditions
issues.description: Competitors have comprehensive guides for top 50 health conditions; you cover only 15.

recommendations.title: Expand condition coverage systematically
recommendations.description: Create comprehensive, medically-reviewed guides for top 100 health conditions.

modules.name: AI Visibility
modules.description: Measures presence in AI-powered search results (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini)

insights.title: Moderate presence in health queries
insights.description: Your site appears in 28% of relevant health queries in ChatGPT, below industry average of 35%.

issues.title: Low citation rate in medical comparisons
issues.description: When AI models compare treatment options, your content is rarely cited.

recommendations.title: Create evidence-based comparison guides
recommendations.description: Develop detailed, medically-sourced comparison content for common treatment options.

modules.name: Brand Sentiment
modules.description: Analyzes how AI models characterize and position your brand

insights.title: Positive patient-focused characterization
insights.description: AI models describe your brand as patient-focused and accessible in 72% of mentions.

issues.title: Occasional outdated service information
issues.description: Some AI responses reference discontinued services or old pricing.

recommendations.title: Maintain up-to-date service directory
recommendations.description: Regularly update service offerings, pricing, and availability information.

modules.name: Content Analysis
modules.description: Analyzes content quality, relevance, and AI-friendliness

insights.title: Excellent product content depth
insights.description: Product descriptions are comprehensive with detailed sustainability information that AI models value.

insights.title: Strong sustainability narrative
insights.description: Environmental commitment is clearly communicated and consistently reinforced across content.

issues.title: Limited category page content
issues.description: Category pages have minimal unique content, mostly relying on product listings.

recommendations.title: Enhance category pages with educational content
recommendations.description: Add buying guides, sustainability tips, and category-specific eco-information.

modules.name: E-E-A-T Assessment
modules.description: Evaluates Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

insights.title: Industry certifications well-displayed
insights.description: B-Corp certification and eco-labels are prominently featured, boosting trust signals.

insights.title: Strong third-party validation
insights.description: Multiple sustainability certifications from recognized organizations enhance authority.

issues.title: Product sourcing transparency could improve
issues.description: Some products lack detailed supply chain information that eco-conscious consumers seek.

recommendations.title: Add detailed supply chain information
recommendations.description: Provide transparency about product origins, manufacturing processes, and sustainability metrics.

modules.name: Keyword Optimization
modules.description: Analyzes keyword targeting for AI-first search contexts

insights.title: Good coverage of eco-friendly search terms
insights.description: Content effectively targets sustainability-related conversational queries.

issues.title: Missing comparison and alternative queries
issues.description: Limited content for 'eco-friendly alternative to X' type queries that AI models frequently answer.

recommendations.title: Create sustainable alternative guides
recommendations.description: Develop content comparing eco-friendly alternatives to common conventional products.

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Evaluates technical infrastructure and crawlability

insights.title: Excellent site performance
insights.description: Fast loading times and optimized images provide great user experience and crawl efficiency.

issues.title: Product schema missing sustainability fields
issues.description: Product schema doesn't include sustainability attributes that AI models could use.

recommendations.title: Enhance product schema with sustainability data
recommendations.description: Add custom schema fields for eco-certifications, carbon footprint, and sustainability ratings.

modules.name: Competitor Analysis
modules.description: Benchmarks performance against key competitors in AI-first search

insights.title: Leading in sustainability positioning
insights.description: Your brand is cited 45% more often than competitors for eco-friendly product queries.

issues.title: Competitors have more educational content
issues.description: Major competitors publish 2-3x more sustainability education content monthly.

recommendations.title: Increase educational content production
recommendations.description: Publish weekly sustainability guides, how-tos, and eco-living tips.

modules.name: AI Visibility
modules.description: Measures presence in AI-powered search results (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini)

insights.title: Excellent ChatGPT and Perplexity presence
insights.description: Your products are recommended in 52% of relevant eco-shopping queries across AI search engines.

issues.title: Lower visibility in Gemini
issues.description: Gemini cites your brand less frequently (32%) compared to ChatGPT and Perplexity.

recommendations.title: Optimize for Gemini's preferences
recommendations.description: Focus on structured data and visual content that Gemini prioritizes.

modules.name: Brand Sentiment
modules.description: Analyzes how AI models characterize and position your brand

insights.title: Overwhelmingly positive sentiment
insights.description: AI models use positive sustainability descriptors in 88% of brand mentions.

insights.title: Strong eco-leadership association
insights.description: Your brand is positioned as a sustainability leader in the e-commerce space.

issues.title: Minimal negative sentiment
issues.description: Occasional mentions of higher pricing compared to conventional alternatives.

recommendations.title: Communicate value proposition clearly
recommendations.description: Create content explaining the true cost of sustainability and value beyond price.
